item.title: Problem with else, please help and explain
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Or just a small fix to yours … if(castSpell == 1162) //Low Alch { if(playerLevel[6] >= 21) { if(playerHasItemAmount(561, 10) == true) { alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3); deleteItem(561, getItemSlot(561), 10); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvaluez); addSkillXP((31*playerLevel[6]), 6); startAnimation(712); playerGfx(112, 0); newAnimDelay = 4; newAnim = 712; newAnimRequired = true; } else if(playerLevel[6] < 21) { sendMessage("You need a higher mage level to cast this spell."); } else if(!playerHasItemAmount(561, 10)) { sendMessage("10 nats."); } } }

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with else, please help and explain

item.title: Problem with else, please help and explain
item.dc:creator: @King_C_R_0_W_N King C R 0 W N
item.description:
@King_C_R_0_W_N wrote:

Want my high alch and low alch?..

[code]else if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -55)
{
if(!playerHasItemAmount(561, 10))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(561, 10))
{
alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3);
deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
addItem(995, alchvaluez);
addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[6]), 6);
startAnimation(713);
playerGfx(113, 0);
deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 10);
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 21)
{
sendMessage(“You need at least 55 Magic to cast High Level Alchemy”);
}
}

else if(castSpell == 1162) // low Alch
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -21)
{
if(!playerHasItemAmount(561, 10))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(561, 10))
{
alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 5);
deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
addItem(995, alchvaluez);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[6]), 6);
startAnimation(712);
playerGfx(112, 0);
deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 10);
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 21)
{
sendMessage(“You need at least 21 Magic to cast Low Level Alchemy”);
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with else, please help and explain

item.title: Problem with else, please help and explain
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

if(castSpell == 1162) //Low Alch { if(playerLevel[6] >= 21) { if(playerHasItemAmount(561, 10) == true) { alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3); deleteItem(561, getItemSlot(561), 10); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvaluez); addSkillXP((31*playerLevel[6]), 6); startAnimation(712); playerGfx(112, 0); newAnimDelay = 4; newAnim = 712; newAnimRequired = true; } if(playerLevel[6] <= 21) { if(playerHasItemAmount(561, 10) == false); } { sendMessage("10 nats."); } }
The last part, I can’t make it else if(blah), so it says 10 nats each alch :
Really annoying…
And I screwed up my high alch, so if no message is sent, and no alching is done, people with think that I messed up low alch too, and won’t be happy. And nobody reads their welcome messages…

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with else, please help and explain
